document_data.name: Determine Final Rest
document_data.mainbody: '''''Determine final rest''''' was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[divination]] [[spell]] used by specialty priests devoted to [[Jergal]] called [[Doomscribe]]s.
document_data.Effects: This spell was used to reveal the aura of a living or dead creature and which [[outer plane]], and specific level within that plane, their soul should be assigned. Spells that prevented a ''[[know alignment]]'' spell from working affected this spell in the same way.
document_data.Components: This spell required only  [[verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast.
